scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder mainly comprises numerous bills, receipts, accounts, and checks along with promissory notes assuring that John Hunt Morgan will pay back the First and City National Bank of Lexington, Kentucky, and a letter to John Hunt Morgan of Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, from P.W. Miller thanking him for the photos he sent. The vast majority of the financial documents in this folder record goods and services purchased by Mrs. Ellen Howard Morgan and her daughter, Miss Ellen "Nellie" Key Howard Morgan, from businesses in Lexington, Kentucky, and monthly payments of water, gas, and telephone bills for their shared residence.
